ecommerce.title: E-commerce Automation
ecommerce.description: Implementation of process automation for an e-commerce platform.

modal.description: Complete automation of the inventory management and price update process for an e-commerce platform.
modal.result2: Saving of 20 hours weekly on manual tasks

api_integration.title: API Integration with n8n
api_integration.description: Data flow automation between CRM and accounting tool using n8n.

modal.description: Automation of the data flow between the company's CRM and its accounting tool using n8n to synchronize customer and invoice information.

web_performance.title: Web Performance Testing
web_performance.description: Load and stress analysis for an insurance company's web portal with JMeter.

modal.description: Exhaustive load and stress evaluation for an insurer's web portal during high-traffic events like promotional campaigns.
modal.result1: Identification and resolution of critical bottlenecks
modal.result3: Capacity increase from 500 to 2000 concurrent requests

api_performance.title: API Performance Testing
api_performance.description: Performance and scalability evaluation of a financial services REST API.

modal.description: Detailed analysis of performance and scalability of a critical REST API for financial services, identifying limits and optimizing its response capability.
modal.result1: Identification of failure points under load
modal.result3: Increase in capacity from 1000 to 5000 transactions per second

qa_automation.title: QA Test Automation
qa_automation.description: Implementation of automated suite for functional and regression testing.

modal.description: Development and implementation of a complete automated test suite for a complex web application, significantly reducing regression testing time.
modal.result3: Continuous integration with the development pipeline

functional_testing.title: Complete Functional Testing
functional_testing.description: Creation of a complete functional test suite for a banking application.

modal.description: Design and execution of a comprehensive functional testing plan for a new mobile banking application, ensuring requirements compliance and transaction security.
modal.result2: Identification and resolution of 50+ critical defects

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does an automation project take?
faq.a1: The time varies depending on the project's complexity. A small project can take 2 to 4 weeks, while a more complex one can extend over several months. We provide accurate estimates after an initial assessment.
faq.q2: What tools do you use for performance testing?
faq.a2: I use industry-leading tools such as Apache JMeter, NeoLoad, LoadRunner, and k6, depending on the specific needs of the project.
faq.q3: Do you offer maintenance for automated scripts?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer proactive maintenance plans to ensure your automated scripts continue to function correctly even after updates to your application.
